title: Picture of the Day Wallpaper
features: choose the update interval (from 1 hour to 48 hours)
choose if you want the image to scroll (doesn't work in newer Android versions like 4.1 due to some bad OS changes)
choose if you want to get new images when you are on your data plan
choose if you want to store the images on your device for good or just for buffering
description: Notice: this is the free edition, so some features are disabled.This live wallpaper needs for permissions, and this is why:ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: to find out if you are on your dataplan or wifi (to save traffic)INTERNET: obviously for downloading the imagesWRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: bufferung the imagesREAD_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: buffering the images
details: {"Release Date": "2013", "Date first listed on Amazon": "July 18, 2013", "Developed By": "sunlooker", "Size": "228.2KB", "Version": "1.0.0", "Application Permissions": ["Access information about networks", "Open network sockets", "Write to external storage"], "Minimum Operating System": "Android 2.1", "Approximate Download Time": "Less than 30 seconds"}
